features.name: Relentless (2)
features.effect: The Box can be spotlighted up to two times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight.

features.name: Randomized Tactics
features.effect:
Mark a Stress and roll a d6. The Box uses the corresponding move:
1. Mana Beam. Make an attack against a target within Far range. On a success, they take 2d10+2 magic damage.
2. Fire Jets. Make an attack against all targets within Close range. On a success, they take 2d8 physical damage.
3. Trample. Make an attack against all PCs within Close range. On a success, they take 1d6+5 physical damage and are Vulnerable until their next roll with Hope.
4. Shocking Gas. All targets within Close range must succeed on a Finesse Roll or mark 3 Stress.
5. Stunning Clap. All targets within Very Close range must succeed on a Strength Roll or be Vulnerable until the cube is defeated.
6. Psionic Whine. All targets within Close range must succeed on a Presence Roll or take 2d4+9 direct magic damage.

on_success.duration_text: until their next roll with Hope

features.name: Overcharge
features.effect: Before rolling damage for the Box's attack, you can mark a Stress to add a d6 to the roll and gain a Fear.

features.name: Death Quake
features.effect: When the Box marks their last HP, the magic powering them ruptures in an explosion. All targets within Close range must succeed on an Instinct Roll or take 2d8+1 magic damage.

details.condition: roll a d10, on 8 or higher

features.name: Lava Splash
features.effect: When the Molten Scourge takes Severe damage from an attack within Very Close range, molten blood gushes from the wound and deals 2d10+4 direct physical damage to the attacker.

features.name: Ashen Vengeance (Phase Change)
features.effect: When the Molten Scourge marks their last HP, replace them with the Ashen Tyrant and spotlight them.

features.name: Relentless (2)
features.effect: The Obsidian Predator can be spotlighted up to two times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight.

features.name: Flying
features.effect: While flying, the Obsidian Predator gains a +3 bonus to their Difficulty.

features.name: Obsidian Scales
features.effect: The Obsidian Predator is resistant to physical damage.

features.name: Avalanche Tail
features.effect: Mark a Stress to make an attack against all targets within Close range. Targets take 4d6+4 physical damage on a success, are knocked back to Far range, and are Vulnerable until their next roll with Hope.

on_success.duration_text: until their next roll with Hope

features.name: Dive-Bomb
features.effect: If the Obsidian Predator is flying, mark a Stress to choose a point within Far range and move to it. Make an attack against all targets within Very Close range of that point. On a success, targets take 2d10+6 physical damage, mark 1 Stress, and lose 1 Hope.

details.condition: If the Obsidian Predator is flying

features.name: Erupting Rage (Phase Change)
features.effect: When the Obsidian Predator marks their last HP, replace them with the Molten Scourge and spotlight them.

features.name: Terrifying
features.effect: When the Zombie makes a successful attack, all PCs within Far range lose a Hope and you gain a Fear.

features.name: Fearsome Presence
features.effect: PCs can't spend Hope to use features against the Zombie.

details.description: PCs can't spend Hope to use features against the Zombie.

features.name: Perfect Strike
features.effect: Mark a Stress to make a standard attack against all targets within Very Close range. Targets the Zombie succeeds against are Vulnerable until their next rest.

on_success.duration_text: until their next rest

features.name: Skilled Opportunist
features.effect: When another adversary deals damage to a target within Very Close range of the Zombie, you can spend a Fear to add the Zombie's standard attack damage to the damage roll.

features.name: Horde (2d6+5)
features.effect: When the Legion has marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 2d6+5 physical damage instead.

features.name: Unyielding
features.effect: The Legion has resistance to physical damage.

features.name: Relentless (2)
features.effect: The Legion can be spotlighted up to two times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight them.

features.name: Overwhelm
features.effect: When the Legion takes Minor damage from an attack within Melee range, you can mark a Stress to make a standard attack with advantage against the attacker.
